title: IT Operations Ontology
description: IT Operations Ontology
url: https://github.com/IBM/itops-ontology
tag: "KF"
tags: ["KF"]
weight: 1
---



## Description

ITOPS leverages Linked Open Data (LOD) resources like Wikidata to automatically construct domain-specific ontologies. From a small set of user-defined seed concepts, the ITOPS pipeline generates a rich graph that can be queried and inferenced over with standard RDF/OWL technologies.

## Main Contributors

R. Uceda-Sosa, N. Mihindukulasooriya, S. Bansal, S. Nagar. A. Kumar. V. Agarwal
